description: This problem involves assessing the efficiency and effectiveness of communication methods between microservices in a distributed system. It aims to identify bottlenecks and optimize the interactions to enhance overall system performance.
you_have_this_if: You are experiencing latency issues in your microservices interactions.
Your system's throughput is lower than expected.
You are considering changes to your microservices communication protocols.
You need to scale your microservices architecture and want to ensure optimal communication.
You have multiple communication methods and need to evaluate their performance.

approaches.best_for: When evaluating communication protocols for new microservices or optimizing existing architectures.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Provides a structured approach but may require significant setup time.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a comprehensive evaluation of various communication methods in a microservices architecture.

start_here: The recommended first approach is to use the Performance Evaluation Framework, as it provides a structured methodology for assessing communication performance and can guide optimization efforts effectively.
